thread.section_title: Greyhours Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greyhours | greyhours.com
thread.title: Morgan Henri

author: Morgan Henri
title: Morgan Henri
text:
To my surprise the watch came in an amazing packaging. Beautiful box to showcase such a high quality product. (fast delivery by the way, especially for an order made just around xmas).
The watch itself is fantastic. No surprise there, you are paying a very friendly price for a luxury product.
I have the blue one. The coating is impressing. Been wearing it at work for now a month. Already knocked it once on a wall. Really scared me as I thought it would be chipped. But nothing. As new. No scratch, no chip, no mark. I love the look of it and received so many compliments about it already. Will definitely get another one.
